name: Mr. Jacks Tragedy
description:
» Lore--------

You are a person who dreams of becoming a member of the world famous freak show "Mr Jack's". The show is coming to town and you will have the opportunity to ask the showmaster to join...

» Controls--------

Attack / Interact: Right Click / Space Bar / South Button.

Move: Arrows, WASD, Left stick.

» Credits--------

Audio assets. FMA, FreeSounds.

2D/3D art. Daniel Nachon.

Unity Development. Diego Nachon.
